fields.name: Surround the code in three backticks
fields.value: If using new lines, a file extension can be placed directly after the first 3 backticks to highlight in that language. An example is shown below, highlighting code in arduino. The backtick key is typically found to the left of the 1 key.

embeds.title: Please copy the 3 characters above and place them before & after your code message
embeds.description: For mobile hold this message and tap "Copy Text"
